topic.title: Why is everyone here so MEAN?
topic.body: Title. I get it guys, we're all a little mad about the whole 8chan debacle, but SERIOUSLY, calm down! No need for all this racism/anti-semitism/homophobia.

1565148429_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_858_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Remember the YouTube shooter? I guess it's YouTube's fault because she was a YouTuber.

Dude, you CANNOT think that is an actually good point... like seriously? You're an idiot!!!!!!
